website_summaries.verdict: The most comprehensive brew kit you will find. Contains everything you need to brew five gallons of delicious beer.
pros: An all-inclusive package containing glasses, thermometers, and even cleaning supplies
Kit produces five gallons of high-quality beer in just three days
cons: It's on the expensive side, but it's worth the cost if you are serious about home brewing

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the equipment that came with the beer making kit, but it was difficult to figure out how to brew the beer. I had to buy a book, use YouTube, and phone a friend to make sure I was doing it right. It could use more descriptive directions.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann Parrilla

customer_reviews.title: Beer brewing done right
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I had been wanting to get into brewing for awhile and did a lot of research. This kit seemed like the best bang for the buck. I have been very happy with it. The carboy dryer came arrived chipped on the feet but Norther Brewer sent a new one right away. I highly recommend this kit and Northern Brewer has great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Hydrometer was destroyed inside box with no damage to outside of package. Siphon is way too short (12") to reach bottom of carboy and doesn't hold suction. Recipe instructions missing crucial info. All this made for a disappointing experience.

product_meta.title: Northern Brewer Deluxe Homebrew Starter Kit, Equipment and 5 Gallon Recipe (Fresh Squished IPA)
feature_bullets: PROVEN: The Deluxe Brewery in a Box is our best-selling beer brewing starter kit in history! Tested by our employees and trusted by our customers for over 20 years.
CURATED ingredients for 5 gallons of homemade beer that tastes like it was made by professionals. Recipe: Fresh Squished IPA. Yield: 50 twelve ounce bottles.
FRESH SQUISHED IPA: Grapefruit, melon, berries, lime, passion fruit. Dripping with vivid flavors, Fresh Squished is the hoppy equivalent of visiting your local fruit stand.
FEATURING: 2 premium large glass bottles (carboys) for two-stage fermentation. Foolproof instructions. Your first homebrew is a guaranteed success.

CONTAINS: Fresh Squished IPA Recipe Kit, 6 Gallon Glass Carboy (Primary Fermentor), Bung & Airlock, 5 Gallon Glass Carboy (Secondary Fermentor), Bung & Airlock, Blowoff Hose, Funnel & Adhesive Thermometers, Auto-Siphon & Tubing, Bottling Bucket & Spigot, Bottle Filler & Tubing, Bottle Capper & Caps, Carboy Brush & Bottle Cleaning Brush, Brewery Cleaner & Carboy Dryer. REQUIRED BUT NOT INCLUDED: a 4 to 5 gallon brew kettle and roughly 50 empty 12oz beer bottles that accept pry-off caps.
